## ProgressOptions.styleContext property

Style context for rendering colors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
styleContext?: StyleContext;
```

## Remarks

In browser environments, pass the browser style context to enable colors. If not provided, uses the default context from `createDefaultContext()`<!-- -->.
